languages.text: "Полагаю, мы можем закончить с обучением. Теперь играть будем по-настоящему — без поддавков и скидок на неопытность".
"I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, мы можем закончить с обучением. Теперь играть будем по-настоящему — без поддавков и скидок на неопытность".

traits.locale_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for the lack of experience."
"I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for the lack of experience."
"I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."
"I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."
"I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

languages.text: 「学習はこれで十分だろう。次は本格的にプレイする番だ。遠慮は要らない。経験のなさを考えなくてもいい」
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: 「学習はこれで十分だろう。次は本格的にプレイする番だ。遠慮は要らない。経験のなさを考えなくてもいい」

languages.text: “我觉得教学差不多该到此为止了，是时候来一场真正的对决了。我不会留手，也不会因为你缺乏经验而放水。”
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: “我觉得教学差不多该到此为止了，是时候来一场真正的对决了。我不会留手，也不会因为你缺乏经验而放水。”

languages.text: « Nous nous sommes suffisamment entraînés. Il est temps de jouer pour de vrai, sans nous faire de cadeaux et sans passe-droits pour manque d'expérience. »
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous sommes suffisamment entraînés. Il est temps de jouer pour de vrai, sans nous faire de cadeaux et sans passe-droits pour manque d'expérience. »

languages.text: «Creo que ya ha aprendido suficiente. Es hora de empezar a jugar de verdad: sin contenernos y sin concesiones por falta de experiencia».
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que ya ha aprendido suficiente. Es hora de empezar a jugar de verdad: sin contenernos y sin concesiones por falta de experiencia».

languages.text: "Genug gelernt, denke ich. Es ist Zeit, richtig zu spielen – ohne Samthandschuhe und ohne Rücksicht auf mangelnde Erfahrung."
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: "Genug gelernt, denke ich. Es ist Zeit, richtig zu spielen – ohne Samthandschuhe und ohne Rücksicht auf mangelnde Erfahrung."

languages.text: "Sanırım bu kadar ders yeter. Ciddiyetle oynamamızın vakti geldi. Kendini zapt etmek de deneyimsizliğe hoşgörü göstermek de yok."
languages.original_text: "I think that's enough learning. It's time we started playing in earnest — no holding back and no allowances for lack of experience."

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım bu kadar öğrenme yeter. Ciddiyetle oynamamızın vakti geldi. Kendini zapt etmek de deneyimsizliğe hoşgörü göstermek de yok."
